document.full_text: lebron james acquired a minority stake in liverpool soccer club on wednesday after the two-time nba most valuable player's sports marketing firm entered into a partnership with fenway sports group (fsg).
document.title: lebron james acquires minority stake in
lines_and_colors: lebron james acquired a minority stake in liverpool soccer club on wednesday after the two-time nba most valuable player's sports marketing firm entered into a partnership with fenway sports group (fsg).
